pages.text: Wo zai na gaogui de yejian que yi jiang shi ta
ni zen neng zhidao na gaogui de yejian shi shenme
Na gaogui de yejian, shengguo yiqian ge yue
zhong tianshi he jingshen, feng tamen de zhu de mingling, wei yiqie shiwu er zai na yejian jianglin
na yejian quan shi ping'an di, zhidao liming xianzhu de shihou
Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe zhong de bu xindao zhe meiyou likai ziji yuan you de xinyang, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen
Nage mingzheng shi an la suo paiqian de yige shizhe, ta songdu chunjie de ceye
qizhong you xuduo zhengque de jing wen
Xinfeng tian jing zhe, meiyou fen li, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen
Tamen zhi fengming chongbai an la, qiancheng jingyi, keshou zhengjiao, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, zhe shi zhengjiao
Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe, tamen zhong de bu xindao zhe, bi ru huo yu, er yong ju qizhong; zhe deng ren shi zui e de ren
Xindao erqie xingshan de ren, shi zuishan de ren
